home.hero_title: Building the future through open source
home.hero_subtitle: Join OpenRim community of developers and innovators to shape the future of technology.

about.mission: Our mission is to foster innovation through open source collaboration, creating impactful software solutions for a better world.

values.collaboration: We believe in the power of working together, sharing knowledge, and building strong communities.
values.transparency: Everything we do is open and transparent, from our code to our decision-making processes.
values.community: Building a welcoming and inclusive community for all developers, regardless of their background or experience.

contribute.title: Join Our Community
contribute.subtitle: Every contribution matters, no matter how small. Help us build amazing open source software.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Reach out to us through various channels.
